featured.text: Very few people, no matter how intelligent or experienced, can 28 all the possibilities or outcomes of a policy or a course of action within just a short period of time.

definition.zh_def: 有智慧的，能夠理解和學習的。
definition.en_def: Having the ability to think, understand, and learn quickly and effectively.
definition.example: She is an intelligent student who always excels in her studies.
